Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Springfield
ShortDescription: #20 buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central Park, Washington, Pulaski, and Madison, due to a street blockage near Madison/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central Park, Washington, Pulaski, and Madison, due to a street blockage near Madison/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 61st/King Drive
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st  buses are rerouted via 61st, King Drive, 60th, Cottage Grove & 61st, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 61st/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 61st, King Drive, 60th, Cottage Grove & 61st, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 61st/King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed Wilson
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Wilson due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Wilson due to a signal problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
